graphql.query:
mutation CreateUser {
  createUser(
    firstName: "John"
    lastName: "Doe"
    email: "ram91511@gmail.com"  # Fixed email format
    phone: "1234"  # Changed phone number to be unique
    password: "securepassword12347"
    role: "user"
    address: "123 Main St"
    latitude: 12.345678
    longitude: 45.678901
    bio: "Software Developer"
  ) {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    email
    phone
    profilePhoto
    role
    address
    latitude
    longitude
    bio
    isactive
    emailVerified
    phoneVerified
    createdAt
  }
}

query GetUser {
  user(id: 1) {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    email
    phone
    profilePhoto
    role
    address
    latitude
    longitude
    bio
    isactive
    emailVerified
    phoneVerified
    createdAt
    ratings {
      id
      ratedUserId
      ratedByUserId
      ratingValue
      review
      ratingType
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
    followersCount
    followingCount
  }
}

mutation CreateUserRating {
  createUserRating(
    ratedUserId: 1
    ratedByUserId: 5
    ratingValue: 5
    review: "Excellent service!"
    ratingType: "PROFESSIONAL"
  ) {
    id
    ratedUserId
    ratedByUserId
    ratingValue
    review
    ratingType
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

mutation Login {
  login(
    email: "ram9151@gmail.com"
    password: "securepassword1234"
  ) {
    success
    token
    refreshToken
    message
    userInfo {
      id
      firstName
      lastName
      email
      phone
      profilePhoto
      role
      address
      latitude
      longitude
      bio
      isactive
      emailVerified
      phoneVerified
      createdAt
    }
  }
}

mutation CreatePost {
  createPost(
    userId: 155
    title: "Beautiful House for Sale"
    content: "3 bedroom house with garden"
    visibility: "public"
    propertyType: "house"
    location: "New York"
    mapLocation: "40.7128,-74.0060"
    price: 500000.0
    status: "active"
  ) {
    success
    message
    post {
      id
      title
      content
      visibility
      propertyType
      location
      mapLocation
      price
      status
    }
  }
}
